option.name: SCRIPT_TEXT
option.value: $ErrorActionPreference='Stop'; dotnet pack src/CSharpRoll.Cli/CSharpRoll.Cli.csproj -c ToolRelease -o ./artifacts; if ($LASTEXITCODE -ne 0) { exit $LASTEXITCODE }; dotnet tool update --global --add-source ./artifacts CSharpRoll; if ($LASTEXITCODE -ne 0) { dotnet tool install --global --add-source ./artifacts CSharpRoll; if ($LASTEXITCODE -ne 0) { exit $LASTEXITCODE } }; csharproll --help
